title: Where can I find Korean and Chinese Solo Queue Leaderboards?
body: What the title says. Can anyone enlighten me as to where I can find them? It would be much appreciated :)

replies.body:
[Korean leaderboard](http://www.op.gg/ranking/ladder/) (make sure you click on the search box and select KR as it have tons of regions not just korea)

[Chinese leaderboard](http://ff.gg/ranking/CN/N1) (I don't use this site very regularly, but it does have archived leaderboards as well.)
